reviewText:
Buy this film. Support Indie filmmaking. Help Kris make his next film.

This film is what indie filmmaking used to be all about! It is funny, heartfelt, disturbing, and highly entertaining. I cannot recommend it enough. The only negative thing I can say is that once you watch this film, you will want to watch others like it...and, I hate to break it to you, but, there is nothing else like this film. Yes, it is that unique.

As wild and off-the-wall as this film gets, Kris Canonizado still manages to handle the subject matter so delicately, that it gives the film a massive, beating heart.

Highly recommended!

[...]

-Nick
